modName: Blackfall Estate - A Home for Thieves
summary: A medium sized house located just outside Rifen. Darkfall Estate is at first glance just and ordinary home. However, down it's hidden basement lies a sanctuary with anything a thief or otherwise shady character might need.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/xfA2QWa.jpg[/img][color=#c20000]
[/color][/center]
[color=#c20000]If you are changing from the Hearthfire version to the non-Hearthfire version, and vice versa, [size=4]you need [color=#c20000]to retrieve the items you have stored in the house[/color] before changing.[/size]

[color=#f4f4f4]This mod now works with, [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29249/?]Hearthfire multiple adoptions[/url] by [b]TMPhoenix[/b]. This is [u][b]required [/b][/u]for having your spouse and children move in to the estate. Although either version of the mod works fine without it. It will just make that feature unavailable.[/color][/color]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/JFr2Rkq.png[/img]

[list]
[*]A fully furnished house for thieves and other fiendish characters.
[*]A hidden basement filled with everything a crock might have use of.
[*]A hidden entrance leading into Riften.
[*]Two small gardens and an outside barbecue area.
[*]Crafting stations and cooking pot.
[*]Usable weapon racks/plaques, display cases and mannequins.
[/list][list]
[*][color=#ff7700]Hearthfire version:[/color] Can house two children and one spouse.
[/list]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/WA5g6Oa.png[/img]

Darkfall Estate is a seemingly ordinary medium sized house outside Riften. However down it’s hidden basement lies everything a thief or person of ill repute needs. The house comes with a patio that includes an outside barbecue area, a flower garden, a vegetable garden and two chickens. The insides feature a kitchen and dining area along with a bedroom and a study. In the hidden basement there is access to an arsenal, training room and usable crafting equipment, storage area and a treasury. There’s is also a hidden exit leading into Riften which you can find behind the big security door.
Any character can find some good use out of the house if he or she so chooses, as the top level is just an ordinary inconspicuous house.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/Q0iFTJF.png[/img]
[b]The entrance to the secret basement is located behind a false panel in the [url=https://i.imgur.com/O8Tzsh8.jpg/]wardrobe[/url] located in the study.[/b]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/FFLU5SG.png[/img]

The house is located east of the Riften city wall. There is also a hidden entrance next to the wall from inside the city; close to the Thieves Guild hidden entrance.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/BRwDUjB.jpg[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/THpl036.jpg[/img]

[img]https://i.imgur.com/iDKxJIf.png[/img]

[youtube]9Fp_W4NRG7U[/youtube] [youtube]oByxxkTQvOE[/youtube]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/OKL1Lie.png[/img]

To install, put the [b]LBDarkfall Estate.esp[/b] and [b]LBDarkfall Estate.bsa[/b] into your Skyrim [b]data[/b] folder.
To uninstall, remove [b]LBDarkfall Estate.esp[/b] and [b]LBDarkfall Estate.bsa[/b] from the Skyrim [b]data[/b] folder.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/JNZVQxX.png[/img]

The newest version of Skyrim(1.9.32.0.8) is a must.
The Hearthfire version requires Hearthfire.
[color=#c20000][color=#f4f4f4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29249/?]Hearthfire multiple adoptions[/url] by [b]TMPhoenix[/b] it [/color][/color][color=#c20000][color=#f4f4f4]is required for having your spouse and children move in to the estate.[/color][/color]


[img]http://i.imgur.com/7zPX96i.png[/img]

Might be some slight issues with mods that alter Riften and it’s nearby surroundings.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/FyxNUl5.png[/img]

[b]Version 1.2[/b]
[list]
[*]Added a fence and gate.
[*]Hearthfire version: Changed beds to allow children.
[*]Hearthfire version: Added the option for spouses to move in.
[*]Hearthfire version: Added plantable plots for the farm and garden.
[/list][i] And other various small fixes to both versions.
[/i]
[b]Version 1.1[/b] [list]
[*]Added two more beds to the bedroom.
[*]Rearranged some furniture in the vault and treasury.
[*]Fixed the house being set to public.
[i]And other various small fixes.[/i][/list]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/193ubYd.png[/img]

Mod Creator: [b]LightBug[/b]
Assistance: [b]Deor[/b]
[color=#c20000][color=#f4f4f4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29249/?]Hearthfire multiple adoptions[/url] by [b]TMPhoenix[/b].
[/color][/color]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16525/?/]Modders Resource Pack[/url] by Oaristys and Tony67

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14134/?/]OpenBooks[/url] and [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30599/?/]Alchemy Clutter[/url] by Blary
author: LightBug
